#summary This is the updated keymap for SollerOS

SollerOS will be switching to Unicode soon, meaning that all Greek characters, Latin characters, and Cyrillic characters will be supported through this system. The Greek map will be updated to match the position of characters on actual Greek keyboards as will the Cyrillic map. You will no longer have to hold ctrl to stay in a mode, simply press right ctrl followed by a number to switch modes.

|| *Number* || *Mode* ||
|| 1 || Latin ||
|| 2 || Special ||
|| 3 || Greek ||
|| 4 || Cyrillic ||

====Here is the keymap currently in use by SollerOS. This may change as characters are added so remember to check this page to get the current keymap.====
